channel.title: Client Problem
channel.description:
Uhmm...
I Use To Log In Perfectly And Everthing And When I Did A ::pickup Command with item id and amount it froze so i closed it and when i re runned the server this happens now... It lets me login but freezes at the loading part
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/zllz9.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

Dont Worry Guys I Didnt Do Any Big Coding To It
I Just Deleted Source + Client And Re Extracted Nd Done

All I Need To Do Is Get Webclient Nd Then Start My Coding
But Thanks Anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The best thing to do is go to you’re character file, where it says inventory.

Just delete all those lines, then log in. The code you spawned last had not been added with “add models” or “addmodel ___”

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“JuniorCautionz, post:3, topic:393096”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=490265.msg3584996#msg3584996 date=1304104355]
Have you done the ::pickup command before?
[/quote]

Yeah I Have I Was Spawning Some Of The Custom Items To See Them…
And I Spawned One And Client Froze And When I Closed It And Re Runned It, I Logged In And It Kept Freezing At The Loading Screen[/quote]

Which item did you spawn?

Read full topic
